description.compact:
Set DocumentNumber
This identification is a sequential composition of following elements: the document type internal code, followed by a space, followed by the identifier of the document series, followed by (/) and by a sequential number of the document within the series.

Set DocumentNumber
This identification is a sequential composition of following elements: the document type internal code, followed by a space, followed by the identifier of the document series, followed by (/) and by a sequential number of the document within the series.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get DocumentStatus
When this method is invoked will create a new instance of DocumentStatus if not created previous is returned to be populated
The field must be filled in with:
“N” - Normal;
“A” - Cancelled document;
“F” - Billed document, even if partially, when for the same document there is also on table 4.1. – SalesInvoices, the corresponding invoice or simplified invoice.
<xs:element name="DocumentStatus">

Get WorkDate
Date of the last storage of the document status to the second.

Set WorkDate
Date of the last storage of the document status to the second.

Set WorkType

The field shall be filled in with:
“CM” – Table checks;
“CC” – Consignment credit note;
“FC” – Consignment invoice according to art. 38 of the Portuguese VAT Code;
“FO” – Worksheets [to record the service rendered or the work performed];
“NE” – Purchase order;
“OU” – Others [not specified in the remaining WorkTypes];
“OR” – Budgets;
“PF” – Pro forma invoice;
“DC” - Issued documents likely to be presented to the customer for the purpose of checking goods or provision of services (for data until 2017-06-30).
For the insurance sector as to the types of documents identified below must also exist in table 4.1. - SalesInvoices the corresponding invoice or invoice amending document, can also be filled with:
“RP” – Premium or Premium receipt;
“RE” - Return insurance or receipt of return insurance;
“CS” - Imputation to co-insurance companies;
“LD” - Imputation to a leader co-insurance company;
“RA” - Accepted reinsurance.
<xs:element ref="WorkType"/>

Get WorkType

The field shall be filled in with:
“CM” – Table checks;
“CC” – Consignment credit note;
“FC” – Consignment invoice according to art. 38 of the Portuguese VAT Code;
“FO” – Worksheets [to record the service rendered or the work performed];
“NE” – Purchase order;
“OU” – Others [not specified in the remaining WorkTypes];
“OR” – Budgets;
“PF” – Pro forma invoice;
“DC” - Issued documents likely to be presented to the customer for the purpose of checking goods or provision of services (for data until 2017-06-30).
For the insurance sector as to the types of documents identified below must also exist in table 4.1. - SalesInvoices the corresponding invoice or invoice amending document, can also be filled with:
“RP” – Premium or Premium receipt;
“RE” - Return insurance or receipt of return insurance;
“CS” - Imputation to co-insurance companies;
“LD” - Imputation to a leader co-insurance company;
“RA” - Accepted reinsurance.
<xs:element ref="WorkType"/>

Add Line
This method when is invoke will create a new Line instace and add to satck then will be returned to be populated. The line number is set automatacly but you can set other.

Get DocumentTotals
When this method is invoked will create a new instance of DocumentTotals if nor created previous is returned to be populated
<xs:element name="DocumentTotals">
The calulated values made by the validation classes

<xs:element ref = "HashControl"/> <xs:element name="HashControl" type="SAFPTHashControl"/> <xs:simpleType name="SAFPTHashControl">  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">      <xs:pattern value="[0-9]+|[0-9]+[.][0-9]+|[0-9]+-[A-Z]{2}(M )([^ ]+[/][0-9]+)|[0-9]+-[A-Z]{2}(D )([^ ]+ [^/^ ]+[/][0-9]+)"></xs:pattern>      <xs:minLength value="1"/>      <xs:maxLength value="70"/>  </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>

<xs:element ref = "Period" minOccurs = "0"/>  <xs:element name="Period">    <xs:simpleType>       <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">           <xs:minInclusive value="1"/>           <xs:maxInclusive value="12"/>       </xs:restriction>    </xs:simpleType>  </xs:element>
Abstract class for common method and properties of WorkDocument, StockMovement and invoice
Get Set the ATCUD This field shall contain the Document Unique Code.

Set the ATCUD
This field shall contain the Document Unique Code.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get hash
The signature in the terms of Ordinance nº 363/2010 of 23rd June.

Set Hash
The signature in the terms of Ordinance nº 363/2010 of 23rd June.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get hash control
Version of the protected key used in the creation of signature of field 4.2.3.4. – Hash.

Set hash control
Version of the protected key used in the creation of signature of field 4.2.3.4. – Hash.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get period
The month of the taxation period shall be indicated from “1” to “12”, counting from the start.

docblock.description:
<xs:element ref = "Period" minOccurs = "0"/>
 <xs:element name="Period">
   <xs:simpleType>
      <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">
          <xs:minInclusive value="1"/>
          <xs:maxInclusive value="12"/>
      </xs:restriction>
   </xs:simpleType>
 </xs:element>

description.compact:
Set period
The month of the taxation period shall be indicated from “1” to “12”, counting from the start.

docblock.description:
<xs:element ref = "Period" minOccurs = "0"/>
 <xs:element name="Period">
   <xs:simpleType>
      <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">
          <xs:minInclusive value="1"/>
          <xs:maxInclusive value="12"/>
      </xs:restriction>
   </xs:simpleType>
 </xs:element>

return.description: true if the value is valid

Code of the economic activity to which the document relates shall be indicated.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Set System entry date
Date of the last time the record was saved at the time of signing.

docblock.description:
Shall include hour, minute and second. Date and time type: “YYYY–MM–DDThh:mm:ss”.
<xs:element ref = "SystemEntryDate"/>

description.compact:
Set System entry date
Date of the last time the record was saved at the time of signing.

docblock.description:
Shall include hour, minute and second. Date and time type: “YYYY–MM–DDThh:mm:ss”.
<xs:element ref = "SystemEntryDate"/>

description.compact:
Get transaction id
If an accounting record is created, filling in is compulsory if it is an integrated accounting and invoicing system, even if the file type (TaxAccountingBasis) shall not contain tables relating accounting.
If $create is true and a inatnce wasn't created previous a new instance will be created <xs:element ref = "TransactionID" minOccurs = "0"/>

param.description: If is true and a inatnce wasn't created previous a new instance will be created

description.compact:
Get CustomerID
The unique key of the table 2.2. - Customer respecting the rule defined for 2.2.1. - CustomerID.
<xs:element ref = "CustomerID"/>
<xs:element name="CustomerID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

Set CustomerID
The unique key of the table 2.2. - Customer respecting the rule defined for 2.2.1. - CustomerID.
<xs:element ref = "CustomerID"/>
<xs:element name="CustomerID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid
